Module nl.naturalis.common
Package nl.naturalis.common.io

Class REZipOutputStream.Builder

java.lang.Object
nl.naturalis.common.io.REZipOutputStream.Builder
Enclosing class:
REZipOutputStream
public static class REZipOutputStream.Builder
extends Object
A builder class for REZipOutputStream instances.
Author:
Ayco Holleman

  • Method Details

    • addEntry

      public REZipOutputStream.Builder addEntry​(String name)
      Adds a buffered zip entry with the specified name. The buffer is swapped to file when it grows beyond 1 megabyte.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the zip entry
      Returns:
      This Builder

    • addEntry

      public REZipOutputStream.Builder addEntry​(String name, int bufSize)
      Adds a buffered zip entry with the specified name. The buffer is swapped to file when it grows beyond bufSize bytes. Bytes entering the buffer are compressed to decrease the chance it needs to be swapped out to file.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the zip entry
      bufSize - The buffer size in bytes
      Returns:
      This Builder

    • addEntry

      public REZipOutputStream.Builder addEntry​(String name, int bufSize, boolean nio)
      Adds a buffered zip entry with the specified name. The buffer is swapped to file when it grows beyond bufSize bytes. Bytes entering the buffer are compressed to decrease the chance it needs to be swapped out to file. You can optional specify that you want to use a implementation based on java.nio for buffered zip entries. This might be beneficial for very large entries. Alternatively, you can specify a system property to specify the default implementation: -Dnl.naturalis.common.io.REZipOutputStream.nio=true.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the zip entry
      bufSize - The buffer size in bytes
      nio - Whether or not to use java.nio for zip buffered entries
      Returns:
      This Builder

    • addEntry

      public REZipOutputStream.Builder addEntry​(ZipEntry entry, SwapOutputStream out)
      Adds a buffered zip entry with the specified name. Data is written, buffered and recalled using the specified SwapOutputStream.
      Parameters:
      entry - The zip entry
      out - The output stream to which data for this entry is written
      Returns:
      This Builder

    • withAutoCleanup

      public REZipOutputStream.Builder withAutoCleanup​(boolean cleanup)
      Whether or not to automatically clean up any swap files created by REZipOutputStream. Default true.
      Parameters:
      cleanup - Whether or not to automatically clean up any swap files
      Returns:
      This Builder

    • build

      public REZipOutputStream build() throws IOException
      Returns a new REZipOutputStream instance. The initially active entry will be the main entry.
      Returns:
      A new REZipOutputStream instance
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs
